channel.title: Arios 498
channel.description:
[CENTER][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=5]Welcome To Arios 498[/SIZE][/FONT]
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/l4L89uH.png[/img][/CENTER]
[ATTACH=CONFIG]10444[/ATTACH][/CENTER]
Website: Ariosrsps.com Forums: Ariosrsps.com/forum Download Client: [url=http://ariosrsps.com/game/]http://ariosrsps.com/game/[/url]
[SIZE=4][COLOR="#00FF00"]Server Features:[/COLOR][/SIZE]
- All Working Skills. Except (hunter & Construction, They Are Being Worked On) - All Mini-games Working - Barrows - Pest Control - Clan Wars - Bounty Hunter - Fight Caves - Fight Pits - Rc Guild - Warrior Guild - Castle Wars (Being Worked On) - Barbarian Assault (Being Worked On) - Player Based Grand Exchange - Flawless Quests (All Quests Are Going To Be Worked On) - All Type Of Crafting Works - No Glitches/Bugs. - Over 350 music zones - God wars - Random Events - Can Reach Anywhere In The Server By Walking. Everything Works 100%
[CENTER][SIZE=5]Photos[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Random Events [img]http://imgur.com/delete/vEDp2UkQ5xAI7by[/img]
[img]http://www.runelocus.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/ad17.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.runelocus.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/ad14.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.runelocus.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/ad12.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.runelocus.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/ad9.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
Xp Rates Are 5x Skilling 7.5X Combat! 99's Are Respected! Come And Join Today!
[FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=3]Arios 498 aims to emulate the best period of time for RS, hence a 2008 based remake has been created for the sole purpose of your enjoyment. Unlike other servers, everything from the base to the 1000+ plug-ins that make up the server content has been made from scratch. Each piece of content that has been added has one sole purpose. To be flawless. The hundreds of hours spent developing Arios has produced content that has focused on being completely functional; without using any cheap tricks or shortcuts, while still being made efficiently - the result? Quite possibly one of the most developed remakes, with no consequences to server performance. Now you can relive your favourite RS memories without reliving the lag.[/SIZE][/FONT]
[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[CENTER][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=5]Welcome To Arios 498[/SIZE][/FONT]

[SIZE=4][COLOR="#00FF00"]Server Features:[/COLOR][/SIZE]

  • All Working Skills. Except (hunter & Construction, They Are Being Worked On)
  • All Mini-games Working
    - Barrows

    - Bounty Hunter
    - Fight Caves
    - Fight Pits
    - Rc Guild
    - Warrior Guild
    - Castle Wars (Being Worked On)

  • Player Based Grand Exchange
  • Flawless Quests (All Quests Are Going To Be Worked On)
  • All Type Of Crafting Works
  • No Glitches/Bugs.
  • Over 350 music zones
  • God wars
  • Random Events
  • Can Reach Anywhere In The Server By Walking. Everything Works 100%

[CENTER][SIZE=5]Photos[/SIZE][/CENTER]

[/CENTER]

Xp Rates Are 5x Skilling 7.5X Combat! 99’s Are Respected! Come And Join Today!

[FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=3]Arios 498 aims to emulate the best period of time for RS, hence a 2008 based remake has been created for the sole purpose of your enjoyment. Unlike other servers, everything from the base to the 1000+ plug-ins that make up the server content has been made from scratch. Each piece of content that has been added has one sole purpose. To be flawless. The hundreds of hours spent developing Arios has produced content that has focused on being completely functional; without using any cheap tricks or shortcuts, while still being made efficiently - the result? Quite possibly one of the most developed remakes, with no consequences to server performance. Now you can relive your favourite RS memories without reliving the lag.[/SIZE][/FONT]
